content.p: From industry-led projects and guest lectures to scholarships and placements, we're in an excellent position to link students with leading employers. From industry-led projects to guest lecture and mentoring, employers can reach the best students and make use of our extensive resources and equipment. We have an extremely strong record of collaborative research with industry. Access resources to collaborate, innovate and grow your business. The University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD Contacts: Please see our 'Contact us' page
